RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWIFT RITHMS broke in front, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under strong handling to win as much the best. MON PARADIS trailed into the far turn, rallied determinedly along the rail and got up for second. ANDIAMA chased the winner along the inside, drifted to the five path entering the stretch and was outfinished. CROSSTOWN GIRL chased the winner two wide into the stretch, angled inside the runner up before the furlong marker then finished evenly. FLAXEN vied for the lead three wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Andiama
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, drifted 6path upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Crosstown Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Swift Rithms
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Flaxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Paradis
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, inside, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICHI KITSU broke in front and quickly opened a daylight lead, set all the pace off the rail in the five path and just lasted under left handed urging. APPEALING SENORITA unhurried early, closed willingly through the stretch inside the winner and just missed. NICEASAKITTENSEYES allowed to settle, closed a gap late in the seven path. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT hopped hitting the gate at the start and was no factor. CITY SIGNS chased the winner into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, inside, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: No Twowaysaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Kichi Kitsu
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, clear lead, just lasted, left handed urging,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Louis V. Ruberto Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Niceasakittenseyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late gain 7path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME BREAK vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch, rallied to make the lead nearing the furlong marker and proved best in a stiff drive under strong handling. MY TWO AUNT JOANS away alertly, had a brief early lead, chased the pace into the stretch, dug in three wide but couldn't get by the winner. RESERVATION unhurried early, closed willingly in the eight path through the stretch to also be narrowly beaten. BUDDHA BOY broke in front then drifted out giving up the lead briefly, rushed clear, set the pace off the rail into the stretch then was outfinished. ALDUIN was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Break
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, took over top lane, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Reservation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly 8path lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, chased, dug in late, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Alduin
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Buddha Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, sprinted clear, set pace top lane, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 23. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT MIKEY away alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and prevailed under strong handling. GOLDEN MONEY never far back, rallied late three wide and got up for second. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE chased the winner three then two wide and was outfinished. OAKEN had speed from the start, improved in the five path on the turn then leveled off. CLASSIC MO offered a mild bid in the four path into the stretch then came up empty. HENRY THE CAT was no factor. RONNI'S STORM vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then folded. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED FOLLOWING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, folded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4path, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Mikey
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, strong handling

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Louis V. Ruberto Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Quezada Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5path, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Henry the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 23. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DR. ZARNETT chased the pace along the inside, shifted out to the four path entering the turn, closed with a burst of speed through the final sixteenth of a mile and got up in the final strides. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, widened into the stretch and just missed hanging on. NAMBITI found his best stride late mid track. BIG OHIO had a mild late rally in the six path. OFTEN ENOUGH failed to menace. JOES A ROCKIN was a forward factor four wide then failed to offer the needed response. HONOR THE D vied for lead the lead three wide and faded in the stretch. JACK BE FAST was no factor. ONE CRAZY RIDE had speed through the turn and was through after a half. PLATE IT UP trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Zarnett
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, angled out 4path turn, closed with a rush, in time

ENTRY.NAME: One Crazy Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Often Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ohio
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Nambiti
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 23. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALACRITOUS chased the pace along the inside into the stretch, made the lead and proved best by a narrow margin under right handed urging. LAUDA SPEED stalked the pace into the stretch, dug in three wide and got up for second. JAMMING CAMERON broke in front, set the pace into the stretch, dug in gamely but was outfinished. ASTRO JAK never far back, swung wide and closed ground late in the middle of the racetrack. HAPPILEA wide early, moved up three wide on the turn then leveled off. FAHRENHEIT failed to menace. SPARKY HALE was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Jak
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, late gain mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Fahrenheit
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Alacritous
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied rail, right handed urging, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Sparky Hale
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Staudacher David
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Jamming Cameron
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, outfinished gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Southern Park S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 74. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES, THREE YEARS OLD (OHIO REGISTERED). $50 to nominate, Subscription of $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% to fourth, 3% to fifth and 2% to sixth. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstakes allowed 2 lbs.; Non-winners of two races, 4 lbs.; Maidens, 6 lbs Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, March 20, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEAR PERFECT never far back, rallied along the rail through the stretch under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. LARRY'S ANGEL pressed the pace into the stretch, rallied three wide to make the lead, edged clear before the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. SOFT TALK allowed to settle, moved up four wide into the stretch and finished determinedly. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace into the stretch then weakened. NEECHI close up, dropped back turn on the turn then passed tiring rivals in deep stretch. EMERSON JONES had good early speed inside and faded in the stretch. CHANEL SPIRIT with the second flight, between horses, was through after a half. FACTISIMFLASHY failed to menace. SAVESOMEFORME was outrun. SPARKLING JEWEL was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Emerson Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Near Perfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, long drive rail, right handed urging, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, between horses, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Factisimflashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Neechi
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn, passed tiring rivals lane

ENTRY.NAME: Savesomeforme
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Shakeurskinnylegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Soft Talk
ENTRY.OWNER: Rankin Bobby R and Johnson Charles W
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Larry's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, rallied 3 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkling Jewel
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 23 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT DREAM stalked the pace along the inside into the far turn, shifted out, surged late under strong handling three wide and got up in the final strides. AYY LADIES pressed the pace two wide for five ad one half furlongs, gained a narrow lead, battled until deep stretch, gained the advantage then just missed hanging on. ALSANAH slow early, found her best stride late in the four path. UNCAPTURED FAITH never far back, swung wide then finished evenly six wide. QIA trailed for nearly six furlongs then closed a gap late along the inside. IRON BERTIE sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace for five and one half furlongs, dug in when headed, fought back until deep stretch then gave way. UNESCORTED was no threat. LADY GIULIANA was through after a half. LELAWALA was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace 2nd turn, battled, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out 2nd turn, surged late, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, even finished 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Qia
ENTRY.COMMENT: late gain, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late 4path
